entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Brampton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
